price: 85.yi maraw keexoo kee miidaan qadaalatal duudusaay sinaamak Íe cakkik tu ma daggoysina, isin baaxól umaane ma fixiixisina baaxo baysa mara tikki itteenih keenik iyye.
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡمِكۡيَالَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi awfū al-mik'yāla wal-mīzāna bil-qis'ṭi walā tabkhasū al-nāsa ashyāahum walā taʿthaw fī al-arḍi muf'sidīna
